pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Advanced Cleansing System
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Regenerist Advanced Anti-Ageing Specialty Cleanser Device provides up to 4x better cleansing than cleanser alone (tested on cleansing make-up).

It is an advanced cleansing system that cleanses deeply, gently exfoliates and primes skin for anti-ageing regimen.

Revolutionise your cleaning step!

Benefits:
- Up to 4x better cleansing than cleanser alone (tested on cleansing make-up)
- Gently exfoliates
- Enables better penetration of the actives contained in Micro-Sculpting Cream when used together

Product Attributes Technology:
- 2-Speed Control & Water Resistant: Delivers daily deep cleansing & gentle exfoliation. Water-resistant for use in shower
- Gentle Brush Head (refills available): For better removal of dirt & make-up, even in the T-zone & chin. Specially designed to be gentle on skin for daily use
- Skin Renewal Cleanser: Primes your skin for your anti-ageing regimen. Sample included


Results:
- Skin is instantly cleaner, feels fresher
- Skin texture is improved & smoother with continuous usage
- For even more dramatic results, use in combination with Micro-Sculpting Serum & Micro-Sculpting Cream

Discover Olay. Skincare that meets the needs of every woman. Olay has evolved from once iconic beauty fluid to an extensive skincare brand that delivers younger looking, beautiful skin. With multiple ranges to choose from, women can be assured their skincare routine is tailored to meet their individual wants, needs, aspirations and concerns- be it hydration, sun protection, or targeting ageing. Women are therefore able to challenge what's possible with their skin.

Boxed Contents: Facial cleansing device, Brush head, Skin renewal cleanser (20mL), AA battery included

Size: Facial Cleansing Device, Brush Head, Skin Renewal Cleanser (20mL) And AA Battery Included

KEY FEATURES

• Up to 4x better cleansing than cleanser alone (tested on cleansing make-up).
• Gently exfoliates.
• Enables better penetration of the actives contained in Micro-Sculpting Cream when used together.
• 2-Speed Control & Water Resistant: Delivers daily deep cleansing & gentle exfoliation. Water-resistant for use in shower.
• Gentle Brush Head (refills available): For better removal of dirt & make-up, even in the T-zone & chin. Specially designed to be gentle on skin for daily use.
• Skin Renewal Cleanser: Primes your skin for your anti-ageing regimen.

Warnings

Avoid direct contact with eyes and hairline/hair. If skin irritation or redness occurs, discontinue use. As this product increases exfoliation of facial cleansers, it may also increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Oxidized Polyethylene, Sorbitol, Acrylates Copolymer, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Citric Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Polyquaternium-10, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, PEG-100, Disodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Directions

Directions: Dampen facial skin and brush head lightly with water, dispense skin renewal cleanser in your hand and massage over face. Turn on cleansing brush and gently move around the face for approximately 60 seconds. Rinse face and brush head thoroughly with water.

Installing brush head: Press the brush head onto the connection pin until it locks into position with a click. For best results, replace brush head every 3 months or sooner if bristles become worn.

Installing batteries: Gently rock the battery compartment side to side while pulling to release battery cover. Insert 2 AA batteries aligning +/- symbols. Replace battery cover. Replace batteries as needed. Do not mix old and new batteries as unit may be damaged.

USAGE ADVICE

Choose from among the following regimen steps from Regenerist:
1. Cleanser.
2. Serum.
3. Moisturiser.
4. Eye/Treatment.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
